dialogue.introduction: Pleased to meet you. 2nd of the Tone-class, Chikuma.
dialogue.library_intro: I'm Chikuma. Carrying 4 twin cannons on the foredeck, and with substantial reconnaissance capability, I am the 2nd of the Tone-class heavy cruisers. Together with Tone nee-san, I acted as the important eyes of the Nagumo task force.
dialogue.secretary1: Tone nee-san? Oh, it's just you Admiral.
dialogue.secretary3: Really, Tone nee-san, please don't come that close. Oh, wait? Admiral?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Well… It is about time to lay out an operation… Oh you seem busy… Ah…
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, calling me out to this place... I... my heart is set on my oneesan... Eh? It's about formations? Oh my... Even me...
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Chikuma, all preperations complete! Heading out!
dialogue.equipment1: To take care of just me... Nee-san will get mad, you know?
dialogue.equipment2: I'm so happy♪ I must report this to Tone nee-san.
dialogue.supply: To take care of just me... Nee-san will get mad, you know?
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Keep it a secret. I'm just going to take a quick break.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: My clothes and catapult are all spoilt... I'll go and repair it a little, yes?
dialogue.docking_complete: Looks like a ship has finished repair.
dialogue.ship_construction: It appears that the new ship's construction has been completed.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: I have a report that the operation is complete.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Is reconnaissance okay? Alright, heading out!
dialogue.air_battle: Recon teams, do your best observing my batteries~ (Kai Ni)
dialogue.attack: Nee-san is also doing her best, huh... Attack!
dialogue.night_attack: Recon teams, do your best observing my batteries~
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Recon teams, do your best observing my batteries~
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Recon teams, do your best observing my batteries~
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Recon teams, do your best observing my batteries~
dialogue.mvp: Why am I so strong? There's a person that I want to protect. *giggle*
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Ow! The main cannon!? No, I can still fire!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Ohh... I can't let nee-san see me in such an unsightly shape...
dialogue.sunk: Is nee-san.... okay? She is..? That's great...
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Dear sister, you should not harm those snails. Ah, you are being affectionate? I… is that so?
dialogue.early_summer_2015: The sunshine has gotten stronger. It will be trouble for the skin. I should put on some sunscreen on Tone-neesan, too. Tone-neesan?
dialogue.fall_2015: So it's autumn. What kind of autumn is it to you, Admiral? Oh really? It's the same for me, ehehe.
dialogue.christmas_2015: Admiral, Merry Christmas. Are you enjoying yourself as well? Tonight is a "holy night". Ufufu.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Sister, the end of the year cleaning is a big cleaning day. It's important. After this is over, I'll give you some delicious soba. Let's eat together with the Admiral.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year. Please look forward to working with us sisters together.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Setsubun is the important mission for exorcising evil given once a year. Even Nee-san is so fired up.
